articles.author: Natalie Dreier, Cox Media Group National Content Desk
articles.title: What are the signs, symptoms of rectal and colon cancer? - WHIO TV
articles.description: Colorectal cancer is the third-leading cause of cancer-related deaths for men and fourth for women, but is the second overall when men and women are combined, according to data compiled by the American Cancer Society.
